text: The 1991 Georgia Southern Eagles football team represented the Georgia Southern Eagles of Georgia Southern University during the 1991 NCAA Division I-AA football season. The Eagles played their home games at Paulson Stadium in Statesboro, Georgia. The team was coached by Tim Stowers, in his second year as head coach for the Eagles. This would be the Eagles next to last year as a Division I-AA Independent school. ==Schedule== ==References== Georgia Southern Category:Georgia Southern Eagles football seasons Georgia Southern Eagles football
title: 1991 Georgia Southern Eagles football team
